page.title: 15GARTMORE FLOWER SHOW & GALA
page.content: Every year at the end of August the {Flower Show}is held in the village hall. There are prizes for the biggest onion, best vegetables, baking and knitting and flower arranging. The children's table has prizes for "Garden in a Soup Plate", collages, paintings and flower arrangements. There are also prizes for the best gardens and front borders. The flower show is run by the{Horticutural {Society.} The{Gala Day}is held every summer. It starts with a Fancy Dress Parade and the Crowning of the Gala Queen. There are all sorts of races and a cup is presented to the child with the most points. There are several side shows and a barbeque and the day ends with a disco for all competitors. The sports are run by the{Gartmore {Association.}
